ComicInfo.Summary:
The influence of the fiendish Red Death spans history. In the 30s, she stood against the Shadow, the Green Hornet, and Black Terror. In the 70s, the Red Death resurfaced to challenge two surprising heroes--the new Black Sparrow and Miss Fury! How will the ultimate pulp hero team-up from two past eras shatter the masked vigilantes of today?
